thread.section_title: Factorypure Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Factorypure | factorypure.com
thread.title: Mike D

author: Mike D
title: Mike D
text: I am happy with this purchase. I needed something that would be used for emergencies only so I decided to buy used and spend the money on the extended warranty . Dealing with FactoryPure was A+. They answered every question this generator newbie threw at them. The generator arrived on time. The paint was faded but other than that the generator looked good. It started right up and ran great. I am recommending this company and this generator to my friends
